name: Get off my Seaweed-Lawn BOSS Edition
name_original: Get off my Seaweed-Lawn BOSS Edition
description:
Get off my Seaweed-Lawn BOSS Edition  is a version of the game idea "Get off my Seaweed-Lawn", which was made within a university project of the SRH Hochschule-Heidelberg

Get off my Seaweed-Lawn is a Space Invaders-like Game.

Gameplay:

After defeating a Horde of Enemies Poseidon sent at you for opposing him, you will have to stand your Ground against the God of the Sea himself!
Dodge his Tridents and his Minions Pearls and show him, what you think of his Policy. In the Boss battle you even have a second dimension to move!

Story:

When Poseidon brought the city of Atlantis to the bottom of the sea, it destroyed the seaweed plantation of Algamus Hanfe. Thereby the whole Seaweed of Algamus Hanfe was destroyed! He longs for revenge and wants to hunt down Poseidon with his own hands!

Also try the Blue Edition of the Game me by Amar Civic:

https://ashtyyt.itch.io/get-off-my-seaweed-lawn-blue-edition
